attributes.action: Ban all international passenger flights for two weeks to delay Cronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The situation should then be monitored by Government again in two weeks time to whether extend this ban or lift the ban in two weeks time.  This is very important to delay the spread of the virus - This has already been implemented by other countries. If wet did not implement this then example of Italy could happen here.
attributes.background: It is absolutely now essential to ban all passenger international flights arriving in the UK and leaving the UK for two weeks to delay the spread of the Cronavirus. The ban should also be put on passenger ferries arriving and leaving the UK.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309332

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
